text:
Frank has #COVID19. He updates us on his condition… testing and recovery… and new data on the #coronavirus and #vaccine.

Then, he gives a #stimuluscheckupdate… how it's different from the 2008 bailout… and why politicians need to act now.

Watch here: https://t.co/ly7mwRHUlN https://t.co/NwtT35ZN1w
